text: Evdokiya (, ) is a Russian and Bulgarian variant of the Greek Eudokia (Ευδοκία), a feminine given name. It may refer to: *Evdokiya Rostopchina, Russian poet *Evdokiya Germanova, Russian actress. *Evdokiya Maneva, Bulgarian politician *Evdokiya Popadinova, Bulgarian female footballer *2130 Evdokiya, minor planet ==See also== *Eudoxia (name) - covers all people, places, ships etc. named either Eudokia or derived variants of the name *Evdokija - Serbian variant Category:Bulgarian feminine given names
title: Evdokiya
